refnamediv.refpurpose: Sort an array by key in reverse order

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Sorts an array by key in reverse order, maintaining key to data correlations. This is useful mainly for associative arrays.

example.title: krsort example
example.programlisting:
<?php
$fruits = array ("d"=>"lemon", "a"=>"orange", "b"=>"banana", "c"=>"apple");
krsort ($fruits);
reset ($fruits);
while (list ($key, $val) = each ($fruits)) {
    echo "$key = $val\n";
}
?>
example.screen: d = lemon c = apple b = banana a = orange

refsect1.para: You may modify the behavior of the sort using the optional parameter sort_flags, for details see sort.
refsect1.simpara: See also asort, arsort, ksort, sort, natsort, and rsort.
